tr.td: Generates Loom/Phoenix Sar files using Maven

section.name: Downloads
section.p:
The Loom plugins are downloadable from
Codehaus Distribution Server.

To install in your local Maven plugin repository, ensure that http://dist.jcontainer.org/maven is part of the maven.repo.remote list and simply specify the plugin name as a dependency with type plugin:
<dependency> <groupId>loom</groupId> <artifactId>maven-sar-plugin</artifactId> <version>[plugin-version]</version> <type>plugin</type> </dependency>
